College_Station.KPWJ:
KPWJ and KKEE are a pair of radio stations airing a simulcasted Contemporary Christian Music format, licensed to Kurten, Texas, and Centerville, Texas respectively. The two facilities are broadcasting on 107.7 and 101.3 FM. The stations serve the Bryan – College Station metropolitan area as well as Madisonville, Buffalo, Jewett, and points east of Bryan-College Station, and are owned by Bryan Broadcasting License Corporation. 
KPWJ previously held the callsign KKLB and was licensed to Madisonville, Texas.
